Title: Usire
Overview: The story revolves around Mutthu (Ravichandran) who works for the Zamindar Rudre Gowda (Prakash Raj). He falls in love with Gowda's daughter Chandri (Rachana). Chandri also feels the same way, however, their differing castes become a barrier and they hesitate to start a relationship. Will they get married towards the end is the crux of the story.

Title: Kotigobba
Overview: A humble auto driver leads a happy and content life with his ambitious siblings. However, his siblings are unaware of their brother's past.

Title: neelambari
Overview: Vinod, a reporter, and his crew arrive in Neela Betta to film a supernatural occurrence. However, things take a turn when after interviewing Akhila, a villager, the entire crew goes missing.

Title: Huccha
Overview: Sachidananda, a popular student, wins the collegiate elections through influence and violence. Simultaneously, he makes some enemies and ends up falling in love with a conservative girl.

Title: Diggajaru
Overview: A rich landlord and his servant bond well irrespective of their status. When the landlord wife is murdered, the servant decides to take the blame on himself to save landlord family prestige.

Title: Kurigalu Saar Kurigalu
Overview: Kurigalu Saar Kurigalu is a 2001 Kannada film directed by S. V Rajendra Singh Babu. The film stars Ramesh Aravind, S. Narayan, Mohan Shankar and Prema in lead roles. Music was composed by Hamsalekha.

Title: Banallu Neene Buviyallu Neene
Overview: Gopala Krishna is forced into rehabilitating Lalitha, an amnesiac. He pretends to be her husband in order to help her recover but problems arise when her real husband shows up.
